body:
Another reference is https://github.com/golang/go/issues/11372, for randomizing the scheduler to prevent people from depending on the current order that goroutines happen to run by default. This is in anticipation of future scheduler changes affecting the natural order of goroutines.

In general, it seems like a good idea to randomize things by default to prevent people from becoming dependent on implementation-specific values, whether intentionally or unintentionally.
